resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105706</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105706</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Archeology for Interpreters, A Guide to the Knowledge of the Resource</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Archäologie für Interpreters, eine Anleitung zum
Wissen des Hilfsmittels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Archéologie pour des interprètes, un guide de la
connaissance de la ressource</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Archeology para intérpretes, uma guia ao 
conhecimento do recurso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Archeologia per gli interpretatori, una guida alla
conoscenza della risorsa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχαιολογία για τους διερμηνείς, ένας οδηγός στη 
γνώση του στοιχείου συμπεριφοράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arqueología para los intérpretes, una guía al 
conocimiento del recurso</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Help students learn about archaeological methods and how archaeological interpretations are made. It is organized around questions that include: What is archeology? What do archaeologists do? How do archaeologists determine how old things are?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfe Kursteilnehmer erlernen über 
archäologische Methoden und wie archäologische Deutungen gebildet 
werden. Sie wird um Fragen organisiert, die einschließen: 
Was ist Archäologie? Was tun Archäologen? Wie 
stellen Archäologen fest, wie alte Sachen sind?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants d'aide se renseignent sur des 
méthodes archéologiques et comment des traductions archéologiques 
sont faites. Elle est organisée autour des questions qui 
incluent : Quelle est archéologie ? Que les archéologues
font-ils ? Comment les archéologues déterminent-ils à quel 
point les vieilles choses sont ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes da ajuda aprendem sobre métodos 
archaeological e como as interpretações archaeological são feitas. 
É organizada em torno das perguntas que incluem: Que é 
archeology? Que os arqueólogos fazem? Como os 
arqueólogos determinam como as coisas velhas são?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi di aiuto imparano circa i metodi 
archaeological e come le interpretazioni archaeological sono fatte. 
È organizzato intorno alle domande che includono: Che 
cosa è l'archeologia? Che cosa gli archeologhi fanno? 
Come gli archeologhi determinano come le vecchie cose sono?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές οδηγιών μαθαίνουν για τις αρχαιολογικές 
μεθόδους και πώς οι αρχαιολογικές ερμηνείες δίνονται. 
Οργανώνεται γύρω από τις ερωτήσεις που περιλαμβάνουν: 
Τι είναι αρχαιολογία; Τι οι αρχαιολόγοι κάνουν; 
Πώς οι αρχαιολόγοι καθορίζουν πώς τα παλαιά πράγματα 
είναι;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes de la ayuda aprenden sobre 
métodos arqueológicos y cómo se hacen las interpretaciones 
arqueológicas. Se ordena alrededor de las preguntas que 
incluyen: ¿Cuál es arqueología? ¿Qué los arqueólogos 
hacen? ¿Cómo los arqueólogos se determinan cómo son las 
viejas cosas?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105706</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/archeology-for-interpreters-a-guide-to-the-knowledge-of-the-resource</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
